script:
# script "lisp"
# bgmfile "bgm203" "BgmGakuen004" 0
# background "presidentroom"
# body 0
# pos 0 3
# mask 0 off
# face 0 "happy"
# body 113
# pos 113 3
# scale 113 1 0
# mask 113 off
# alpha 113 0 0
# body 114
# pos 114 4
# scale 114 0.8 0
# alpha 114 0 0
# body 115
# pos 115 3
# scale 115 0.8 0
# alpha 115 0 0
# body 116
# pos 116 1
# scale 116 0.8 0
# alpha 116 0 0
# body 300351
# pos 300351 5
# scale 300351 0.8 0
# alpha 300351 0 0
# voicedelay 9999 "durin_0021" 0.7
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
@
恒例イベント
ファンキル学園開催！
今回のファンキル学園は…

# fadein "black" 2
# se "SE_5776"
# background "student_council_room_daytime"
# alpha 113 1 1
# alpha 0 0 0
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# face 113 "usual"
# voice 6019 "mai_0005"
@
ＭＡＩちゃんが学園に侵入！？
ファンキル学園が
[FF0000]喧嘩上等[-]に！？

# fadein "white" 0.5
# envbody 1000 7 0
# effectstart 1000
# background "courtyard"
# se "SE_5612"
# alpha 113 0 0
# alpha 115 1 0
# alpha 116 1 0
# alpha 300351 1 0
# face 115 "angry"
# face 116 "angry"
# face 300351 "angry"
# textalign "center"
# voicedelay 10085 "guramu_0009"0.5
# voicedelay 30035 "hotengageki_0007" 1.3
@
3つのチームが対立！？
三人の[FF0000]“頭”-ヘッド-[-]が
暴走する！？

# effectskip 1000
# alpha 115 0 0
# alpha 116 0 0
# move 115 4 0
# move 116 2 0
# envbody 2102 12 0
# effectpattern 2102 1 0
# effectstart 2102
# body 500431
# pos 500431 2
# scale 500431 0.8 0
# alpha 500431 0 0
# body 400841
# pos 400841 4
# scale 400841 0.8 0
# alpha 400841 0 0
# alpha 300351 0 0
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# waitandnext 0.5
@
激化する
二人のリーダーの
[FF0000]“喧嘩” -ステゴロ-[-]

# face 115 "angry"
# face 116 "angry"
# voicedelay 10085 "guramu_0010" 0.5
# voicedelay 50043 "burafumasutora_0029" 1.8
# se "SE_0699"
# se "SE_0050"
# envbody 1001 16 0
# effectstart 1001
# alpha 115 1 0.5
# alpha 116 1 0.5
# leftin 115 0.3
# rightin 116 0.3
# textalign "center"
@
激化する
二人のリーダーの
[FF0000]“喧嘩” -ステゴロ-[-]

# effectskip 1001
# se "SE_0602"
# effectskip 1001
# effectskip 2102
# layer 400841 2
# layer 500431 1
# fadein "white" 1
# body 100851
# pos 100851 3
# scale 100851 0.8 0
# mask 100851 off
# alpha 100851 0 0
# alpha 500431 1 0
# alpha 400841 1 0
# alpha 116 0 0
# alpha 115 0 0
# textalign "center"
# voice 4008 "otyinusu_0006"
# voicedelay 50043 "burafumasutora_0033" 0.8
@
[BA55D3]ブラフマーストラ[-]と
[FF0000]オティヌス[-]は
ガチャに新登場！

# se "SE_4780"
# fadein "white" 1
# imageset 1 "school_logo"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imageset 2 "townscape_pos"
# imagescale 2 0.8 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# alpha 500431 0 0
# alpha 400841 0 0
# alpha 100851 1 0
# body 111
# pos 111 3
# scale 111 0.8 0
# alpha 111 0 0
# mask 111 off
# textflame 0 0
# textsize 24
# textalign "center"
# voice 1008 "guramu_0006"
@
[FF0000]イベントストーリー1話[-]
クリアで
[FF0000]グラムGET！！[-]

# fadein "white" 1
# imagealpha 2 1 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# alpha 111 1 0
# layer 111 4
# textflame 0 0
# textsize 32
# textalign "center"
@
ファンキル学園4月…

# se "SE_9022"
# alpha 111 0 0.8
# imagemoveto 2 0 -80 0.8
# imagescale 2 4 0.8
# se "SE_0613"
# fadein "white" 0.5
# sedelay "April_Gakuen_voice" 0.3
# imagealpha 1 1 0.8
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 2
# layer 111 1
# textflame 0 0
# textsize 38
# textalign "center"
@
[0000FF]開 校 ！！[-]
